---
title: T-Test (statistical analysis)
---

The T-Test is a parametric test that compares differences between 2 dependent samples.
The T-Test is "parametric" meanig that it can only be applied to *normally* distributed data.




See [T-test in relation to other tests]({{< var ref-statistical-analysis-overview.path >}})

Function:

- Determines difference from in mean values between 2 groups
